content.rendered: Faculty members seeking course approval for the General Education Program should refer to the GE Approval List to locate the designated signatory/ies of the academic discipline associated with the appropriate GE area.  They should submit to the signatory/ies a Course Outline for review along with the GE Course Proposal Cover Sheet.  The completed GE Course Proposal Sheet should be submitted to the Chair of the General Education Committee..
